articles.author: Joe Coscarelli
articles.title: Prince’s ‘Welcome 2 America,’ an Unreleased Album, Is Due Out in July - The New York Times
articles.description: The politically minded, never-before-heard 2010 album will be the first complete project released from Prince’s storied vault.
articles.content: It also included a quote about the album from Prince at the time, written in his trademark style: The world is fraught with misin4mation. George Orwells vision of the future is here. We need 2 remain… [+862 chars]

articles.title: Fauci: Almost a race between vaccinations and the surge - CNN
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci is cautioning Americans from declaring victory over Covid-19 because there there are signs that a surge could be coming. He talks with CNN's Anderson Cooper about the state of the fight against the coronavirus.

articles.author: AGENCY
articles.title: Former talk show host Piers Morgan says 17 of Meghan Markle's claims are false - The Star Online
articles.description: The TV personality points out a couple of factual accuracy, or what he said was the lack thereof, during his interview on an American TV show.
articles.content:
Piers Morgan let it rip on Monday (April 5), showing his feelings toward Meghan Markle, Duchess of Sussex, who he piled on even before her interview with Oprah Winfrey last month.
